name: Distorted (itch) (lew)
description:
Distorted

In Distorted, you play as a girl named Lily exploring a vast, mysterious dungeon-like landscape of tricks and traps... all while being followed by a dangerous, distorted reflection of her inner self.

Help Lily find the Golden Cherry with her expert abilities in parkour and her will.

Controls KeyboardControllerOutput A D   

Space Bar
Left Stick

Triangle / YMovement (Left / Right)

Jumping / Wall Jumping
Features Wall Jumping

Lily has a good grip when it comes to climbing up and sliding down walls. However she does have a limited amount of stamina. Make sure to always check her hair colour to see how long she can hold on!

Spikes n Traps

Its no easy task for Lily to escape. this dungeon-like horror maze is filled to the brim with deadly traps to stop Lily from reaching her destination.

Damaged Blocks

Damaged Blocks will cave in on Lily when she steps on them. Make sure to be quick in your steps and wall jumps to pass these blocks.

Ascender Block

Ascender Blocks can send Lily flying through stages. Up, Down, Left, Right, it doesn't matter, use them to your advantage to cross gaps and traps.

SPOILERS

!below are spoilers on secrets inside the game!

Hidden Cherries

Lily can find hidden cherries throughout the rooms. They are never visible. It may take some exploring to find the openings...

Golden Cherries

Completing the Game in certain ways can reveal Golden Cherries in the Menu. They are like little trophies for beating the game in a harder way.

  • 1st Cherry: Beat the Game Normally
  • 2nd Cherry: Beat the Game after Collecting every Hidden Cherry
  • 3rd Cherry: Beat the Game without Dying
